CREATE TABLE `bigquery-public-data.noaa_passive_acoustic_index.nrs_metadata`
(
  file_name STRING,
  deployment_name STRING,
  start_date DATE,
  start_time TIME,
  source_organization STRING,
  funding_organization STRING,
  project_name STRING,
  sensor_depth INT64,
  sample_rate INT64,
  duration INT64,
  platform_name STRING,
  lon FLOAT64,
  lat FLOAT64,
  point_geom GEOGRAPHY,
  file_link STRING
);

CREATE TABLE `bigquery-public-data.noaa_passive_acoustic_index.sanctsound_metadata`
(
  file_name STRING,
  data_collection_name STRING,
  start_date DATE,
  start_time TIME,
  source_organization STRING,
  funding_organization STRING,
  project_name STRING,
  sensor_depth FLOAT64,
  sample_rate INT64,
  recording_percent INT64,
  platform_name STRING,
  longitude FLOAT64,
  latitude FLOAT64,
  file_link STRING
);
